attributes.action: stop wasting taxpayers money on an enquiry into MP's expenses and trying to create a new system when there is a clearly obvious system available, viz. by paying expenses on actual spendings which are supported by RECEIPTS>
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What can be simpler than this.  It is about time that our MP's realised that they are elected to serve the public not to screw them. Same applies to MEP's, local councils etc.  There are some who realise this already but not nearly enough, so I apologise to them.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
